prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Organ, Brass, Guitar, Piano, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Organ, Brass, Guitar, and Piano, but no Strings.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Organ, Brass, Guitar, and Piano, but Strings are absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Organ, Brass, Guitar, and Piano, omitting Strings.
